entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
